title: Timr Face Watch Face
description: Timr Face for android Wear is a free, simple and minimalistic watch face designed in line with Google's Material Design.Seconds are indicated by the smooth, animated scale.Depending on the set time format, the watch face will display the time in the 12 or 24 hour format.By long pressing the watch face you can change the color to one of the 11 colors available.You can change the background color and the scale animation rate in the mobile android wear app.To help me improving this app, join our group on Google+ https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/109495654845433807379Design by Adam Lapinski (http://www.yeti-designs.com/)
descriptionHTML:
Timr Face for android Wear is a free, simple and minimalistic watch face designed in line with Google's Material Design.

Seconds are indicated by the smooth, animated scale.
Depending on the set time format, the watch face will display the time in the 12 or 24 hour format.
By long pressing the watch face you can change the color to one of the 11 colors available.
You can change the background color and the scale animation rate in the mobile android wear app.
To help me improving this app, join our group on Google+ https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/109495654845433807379

Design by Adam Lapinski (http://www.yeti-designs.com/)
comments: I like this watch face a lot, but the color still resets despite the last update stating that it was fixed.
To access setting for this app on phone, open android wear app and then watch faces and its setting will be shown there
How can i open this app on the phone? And the meter isnt showing on my watch?!

Gorgeous watch! 2 suggestions!  1. An option to switch between the white background by day and the black one at night!  2. An option to randomize between some preselectable colors (5/7 should be enough) everytime I tilt to view! Will keep the novelty factor going.. Will keep it fresh!   Great work Florian! Yummy material design goodness! üòç Thanx so much. This is now my default watch face!
Like the face. Would be perfect if there is time separation like hr:mm
Seconds on bottom don't work.  Just shows a solid color
